dt: {bc}of, relating to, or based on {a_link|experience} or {a_link|experiment}
{bc}serving the ends of or used as a means of {a_link|experimentation}
{bc}relating to or having the characteristics of experiment {bc}{sx|tentative||}

et: Middle English, borrowed from Medieval Latin {it}experīmentālis,{/it} from Latin {it}experīmentum{/it} "testing, experience, proof" + {it}-ālis{/it} {et_link|-al:1|-al:1} {ma}{mat|experiment:1|}{/ma}
shortdef: of, relating to, or based on experience or experiment
serving the ends of or used as a means of experimentation
relating to or having the characteristics of experiment : tentative

dt: {bc}of or relating to a simple study or plan for research that typically lacks randomization and inclusion of a control group

shortdef: existing or occurring before an experiment
of or relating to a simple study or plan for research that typically lacks randomization and inclusion of a control group
